The Elimination Of The Ancient SpiritsMaze Charneca
Hence, the Harnack even after death uses the damn power and makes his innocent servants to wander forever in the afterlife. It's time to save them.
Destroy Coordinators Graves, Snipers Graves, Summoner's Tomb, the Grave Keepers, Wizards of the Grave, Resurrecting the Grave, Tomb Raiders and Warlocks Graves.
